resources.string: Balances for Whitgift School is an app which allows you to check your lunch and tuck balances and notifies you when they are low.
This app is developed by a student of Whitgift School. This app is not affiliated with Whitgift School or WisePay.
To proceed, you will need your WisePay username and password in hand. If you are a student, ask a parent/guardian or the School Office for the login details.
Enter your WisePay username and password below. They will be stored locally on your phone and will not be stored on the server.
